title: Building BIG Networks: How Making Connections Can Help Your Business
description: This is not a flash-in-the pan, sneaky tactics that will be obsolete in two weeks. Instead this is solid strategy for how to grow big networks including online and offline connections, how to promote other people, handle negative feedback and a host of other important aspects to know if you are going to be using this very valid and amazingly successful lead generation platform.
author: Tara Jacobsen
